named-query.name: FIND_EXPIRED_ANONYMOUS_CUSTOMERS_UIDS_WITHOUT_ORDERS
named-query.query: SELECT c.uidPk FROM CustomerImpl c WHERE c.lastEditDate < ?1 AND c.customerType = 'SINGLE_SESSION_USER' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM OrderImpl ord WHERE ord.customer.uidPk = c.uidPk)

named-query.name: SHOPPING_CART_UIDS_BY_CUSTOMER_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT cart.uidPk FROM ShoppingCartMementoImpl cart WHERE cart.shopperUid IN ( SELECT shopper.uidPk FROM ShopperMementoImpl shopper WHERE shopper.customer.uidPk IN (:list) )

named-query.name: DELETE_CUSTOMERS_BY_UIDS
named-query.query: DELETE FROM CustomerImpl c WHERE c.uidPk IN (:list)
